prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with a fierce expression and bright orange fur.
I want to see a fighting-type Pokemon that has a muscular build and wild attitude.
Generate a unique Pokemon with a mix of vibrant colors and an energetic pose.
Make a character that embodies strength and agility, with prominent limbs and a bold design.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that loves to engage in battles, showcasing its fierce nature.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, known for its quick movements and combat skills.
Show me a lively creature that has a striking appearance and a strong fighting spirit.
